name: Cowboy Canyon
description:
Introduction

The first drop has been said to be the best downclimb on the Colorado Plateau by a 700+ canyoneer. There are several great DC's. A great dark cavern. Easy, flat approach and exit hike. Quality canyon on all fronts. From a technical standpoint, in the top three in Cedar Mesa (also Cheesebox and Black Hole) by a wide margin.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
